defs: a member of the bird of the genus akin to owl; screech owl.
oscillation - a) the act of oscillating; b) (phys.) i) repeated variation in the value of some physical quantity, as position or voltage; ii) a single instance of cycle of such a variation.
a device, as a seat hanging from ropes or chains, on which one can sit and swing backward and forward as a form of amusement; a swing.
a covered litter used, usu. for one person or a deity, carried by poles on the shoulders of two or more men; a palankeen.
the infirmity or instability of the mind; want of power to take a decision.
a body hung from a fixed point so as to swing freely to and fro under the combined forces of gravity and momentum, often used in regulating the movement of clocks; a pendulum.
(phys.) an apparatus, as an electric circuit, for establishing and maintaining oscillations; an oscillator.
a person who oscillates.
the act or amusement of sitting on a swing and swinging backward and forward.
an umbrella, often mere decorative, fixed on a palankeen.
a set of palankeen and an umbrella, carried as a mark of one's royal or religious status.

a series of organised activities by people working concertedly toward some goal, such as revival of art, literature or learning or changes in political, economic or social environment, etc.; a movement.
ಆಂದೋಲನಮನಾಡು āndōlanamanāḍu to move to and fro; to swing; 2. to hold back or delay in making a decision; to oscillate; ಆಂದೋಲನವಾಡು āndōlanavāḍu = ಆಂದೋಲನಮನಾಡು.
the centre of oscillation.

an instrument which shows on a fluorescent screen the variation with the time of the instantaneous values and waveforms of electrical quantities, including voltages translated from sounds or movements; oscilloscope.
an apparatus for producing a curve representing member of electrical and mechanical phenomena which vary cyclically; an oscillograph.
a swing big enough for a person to sleep on; a swing-cot.
swinging; oscillating.
not fixed; unstable.
a covered litter used, usu. for one person or a deity, carried by poles on the shoulders of two or more men; a palankeen.
(mus.) a singing or playing of a long note smoothly submerging itself in the next note.
a rāga (musical mode), having five notes differently in ascending and descending orders, in Karnāṭaka system derived from the main scale Kharaharapriya.
made to oscillate or swing; swung; oscillated.
an act of swinging or fact of being swung; oscillation.
(dance) a particular kind of movement of the arm.
the amusement of swinging.
(mus.) a particular manner of moving from one note to another.
to cause to swing.

lively, joyous play or playfulness; fun; joking.

towards that side; being that side.
the uncomfortable or distressful feeling caused by a desire or need for water and characterised generally by a sensation of dryness in the mouth and throat; thirst.

a source - a) that from which something comes into existence, develops or derives; b) any place or thing by which something is supplied; c) a person, book, document, etc. that provides information; d) the point or thing from which light rays, sound waves, etc. emanate.
that which houses or protects another; a support; prop.
an assemblage; a multitude.

a group of houses in the country, larger than a hamlet and smaller than a city; a village.
a person, thing, circumstance or opportunity acting voluntarily or involuntarily as the agent that brings about an effect or result; a cause.

a book that provides information; a source-book.

an assessment of the value of a property for the purpose of fixing the tax to be paid on it.

the stone on which the goldsmith's rub the gold ornaments to test their genuineness.
having the quality of attracting.
capable of drawing and holding one's attention; attractive; fascinating.

ಆಕಳು ಕಪ್ಪಾದರೆ ಹಾಲು ಕಪ್ಪೆ? ākaḷu kappādare hālu kappe a black hen will lay a white egg; ಆಕಳುಮಂದೆ ākaḷu mande a number of cattle feeding, living or being driven together; a herd; 2. a herd of cattle stayed, usu. overnight, on an agricultural land, for their dung and urine which are useful as manure.
a bright yellow pigment prepared from the unit or bile of a cow, used in medicine.
desiring; aspiring for.
one who desires; an aspirant.
that is desired or aspired.
that which is desired or aspired for.
to be ambitious (to get or do something, esp. something lofty or grand); to yearn or seek (after); to aspire.
strong desire or ambition, as for advancement, honour, etc.; an aspiration.
presence of a word, in a sentence, that is necessary to complete the sense (regarded as one of the three elements necessary to convey a complete sense or thought).
a document containing full details, such as the survey number, its extent, revenue payable, etc. , of an agricultural land.
(gram.) the letter 'ಆ'.
that quality of a thing which depends on the relative position of all points composing its outline or external surface; physical or spatial form; shape.
the way a person appears; aspect; looks.
expression of the face, as giving a clue to one's inward thoughts or mental disposition; facial expression.
something that is meant to indicate a fact, intention, feeling, etc.; an indication; a sign; a token; a hint; a clue.
the structural unity in music, literature, etc; form.
the extent of an arable tract of land.
the land tax to be paid to the government.
the money or other gain received, esp. in a given period, by an individual, corporation, etc. from property, esp. agricultural land.

to put on a (different) form, shape.
a hiding of one's appearance.

a summoning to a contest of any kind but esp. a duel; challenging.
the money or other gain received, esp. in a given period, by an individual, corporation, etc. from property, esp. agricultural land; revenue; income.
the worship of an image held to be the abode of a super human personality; idolatry.

formalism - a) excessive observance of or strict attention to, outward forms, structural unity in music, literature or art; b) excessive observance of forms or conventional usage esp. in religion.
the state or quality of having a perfect form; defectlessness of one's natural form.

relating to form or structure; structural.
that which does not last long; a transient thing.

space or ether, one of the five basic elements which form material reality.
the apparent blue canopy over our heads; the sky.
an absolutely empty space or vacuum; total emptiness.

an empty space.
a metre regulated by the number of syllables, having two long ones followed by a short one (--υ).
(Jain.) one of the six elements.
(math.) the symbol 0, indicating the value of naught; zero; cipher.

ಆಕಾಶಕ್ಕೆ ಏಣಿಹಾಕು ākāśakke ēṇi hāku (fig.) to try to do something which is absolutely impossible; to square a circle;ಆಕಾಶಕ್ಕೆ ಏರಿಸು ākāśakke ērisu (fig.) to praise very highly; to praise to the skies; ಆಕಾಶಕ್ಕೆ ಏರು ākāśakke ēru (fig.) (price of a commodity) to increase abnormally; 2. (fig.) to be elated by success, praise, etc.ಆಕಾಶ ತಲೆಯಮೇಲೆ ಬೀಳು ākāśa taleya mēle bīḷu (fig.) a catastrophe to happen; ಆಕಾಶ ತೂತು ಬೀಳು ākāśa tūtu bīḷu (fig.) to rain heavily and incessantly; ಆಕಾಶದಲ್ಲಿ ಹಾರಾಡು(ತೇಲು) ākāśadalli hāru (tēlu) (fig.) to be excited with joy; to be over the moon; ಆಕಾಶದಿಂದ ಇಳಿದುಬಂದಿರು ākāśadinda iḷidubandiru (sarcastic) to be endowed with divine qualities; ಆಕಾಶ ನೋಡಿಕೊಂಡು ಭಾವಿಗೆ ಉಚ್ಚೆ ಹೊಯ್ಯಿ ākāśa nōḍikoṇḍu bhāvige ucce hoyyi to have a laudable aim, but act in a mean way; ಆಕಾಶ ನೋಡುವುದಕ್ಕೆ ನೂಕುನುಗ್ಗುಲೇಕೆ? ākāśa nōḍuvudakke nūkunuggalēke? When there is ample opportunities why rush like a mad man for it? why cause a stampede to look at the sky? ಆಕಾಶ ನೋಡುತ್ತಿರು ākāśa nōḍuttiru to be empty of thought; to look at lacking ideas; ಆಕಾಶಭೂಮಿಗಳನ್ನು ಒಂದುಮಾಡು ākāśa bhūmigaḷannu ondumāḍu (fig.) to do every thing possible; to move the haven and the earth; 2. to indulge in loud uproar that would bring the very heavens down; to make the welkin ring; ಆಕಾಶ ಹರಿದುಬೀಳುವಾಗ ಅಂಗೈ ಒಡ್ಡಿದರೆ ನಿಂತೀತೆ? ākāśa haridu bīḷuvāga aŋgai oḍḍidare nintīte you cannot prevent a great calamity with a casual effort; umbrella is not a shield against the thunderbolt; ಆಕಾಶ ಹರಿದು ಹೋಗುವ ಹಾಗೆ ಕಿರಿಚು ākāśa haridu hōguva hāge kiricu (fig.) to scream very loudly; to scream the place down; ಆಕಾಶಕ್ಕೆ ಉಗಿದರೆ ಉಗಿದವರ ಮೇಲೆಯೇ ಬೀಳುತ್ತದೆ ākaśakke ugidare ugidavara mēleyē bīḷuttade he who blows in the dust fills his eyes with it.
any of the heavenly bodies as sun, moon, planets, comets, stars, etc.; a heavenly body.

(linguistics) a phoneme (a set of phonetically similar but slightly different sounds in a language that are heard as the same sound by native speakers and are represented in phonemic transcription by the same symbol) whose variants belong to one morpheme; morphophoneme.
the smallest meaningful unit or form in a language (which may be an affix); a morpheme.
the study of morphemes; morphemics.
